---
title: "Signprot in Complex Structure Release"
output: 'html_document'
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv('../data/signprot_data/signprot_release.csv') %>% 
    mutate(year = format(pub_date, "%Y")) %>%
    mutate(date = as.Date(paste0(year, "-01","-01"),"%Y-%m-%d"))

df %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x=date)) +
    geom_bar() +
    scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 year", date_labels = "%Y") +
    theme_minimal()
```
